snippet.title: I Made Pou in 3d But it's a Horror Game
snippet.description:
Watch me take the cute virtual pet game, Pou, and turn it into a terrifying horror game in 3D.
as in this video I'm making a 3D version of Pou the famous mobile game in which you take care of an alien pet that was created by Zakeh (Paul Salameh). A really cute game but not anymore as I remade it into a horror game in which Pou is the one who'd take care but in bad way...
.
Download the game for PC here: https://rudy99.itch.io/bous-revenge
For Android here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Rudy.BousRevange&hl=en_US
.
Game genre: Horror - Action - Fps - 3d.
.
Music: Evan King - Weekly loops season 2 & 3
https://www.youtube.com/ContextSensitive
https://contextsensitive.bandcamp.com/
.
.
00:00 - Intro
00:26 - Remaking Pou into a horror game
07:27 - Outro
.
.
Keywords:
pou horror game, rudy pou, pou horror, rudygamedev, pou revenge game, game dev, i made a game, horror youtuber
